name: Zombie Cure
description:
In the near future, a mysterious zombie virus has spread and more than 70% of humanity has become zombies.

In a desperate situation, a man who has developed a special remedy, "Zombie Cure", throws himself into a lonely battle to save the world, carrying a tank filled with the medicine.

Cure all the zombies!!! 
Cure !!! Cure !!! Cure them all !!!

謎のゾンビウイルスが蔓延し、人類の70%以上がゾンビになってしまった近未来。絶望的な状況の中 特効薬 "ゾンビなおし" を開発した男 "Mr.ゾンビなおし" は、薬の入ったタンクを背負い 世界を救うため 孤独な戦いに身を投じる。

全てのゾンビを治せ！！！

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Created by IKSM_pasta

SE: Otologic, 効果音ラボ
BGM: PUNICPUNPKIN

This game is inspired by "ひもじ村(Ikiki Games)" and "SKT".
